casebody.data:
FORMYDUVAL
v.
BRITT. No. 357A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 8, 2006. Ronnie M. Mitchell, Coy E. Brewer, Jr., Fayetteville, for Britt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of September 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Formyduval) shall have up to and including the 11th day of October 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of September 2006."
